DOC.brief_summary: Clopidogrel potent anti-thrombotic drug inhibits adenosine diphosphate ( ADP ) -induced platelet aggregation . This open-label , randomize , single dose , three-way cross , six sequence study investigate relative bioavailability two 75 milligram ( mg ) clopidogrel tablet formulation ( clopidogrel SB224326 test formulation 1 [ Clop F1 ] clopidogrel SB224326 test formulation 2 [ Clop F2 ] ) compare reference product ( innovator ) healthy human subject . A total 18 healthy human subject randomize , approximately 14 evaluable subject complete study . Total duration study subject approximately 8 week screen follow-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Clopidogrel 75 mg Two Tablet Formulations Relative Reference Tablet Healthy Subjects
